list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor map components and layer interactions.
Streamlined map components (Navigation, AttributeTable, MapElements) by improving tooltips, hover effects, and dynamic UI interactions. Introduced reusable logic for GeoJSON query handling, enhanced state management, and removed redundant code. These changes improve maintainability, usability, and overall performance.

task.summary:
Add initial GIS WebApp with frontend, backend, and map setup
Introduce a React-based frontend with Bootstrap integration, including components for WMS layer management, an interactive attribute table, and basemap handling. Backend setup includes a Django framework configured with basic files to support the application. A base template integrates OpenLayers for map visualization.

Add dynamic styling and labeling for vector layers
Introduced dynamic label placement and color customization for vector layers, leveraging `StyleHandler` and `LabelHandler`. Enhanced user interactivity by adding color pickers, label column selection, and refreshed layer rendering upon map events.

`Refactor map components and improve layer interactions`
Added Rename Layer functionality
Refactored multiple map components and handlers to enhance code readability and consistency. Improved the handling of layer properties, styling, labeling, and attribute table interaction. Added functionalities like editing layer names, dynamic label updates, and better color picker integration with UI optimizations.

Refactor GeoJSON query handling in views.
Extract redundant SQL query logic into a reusable utility function `execute_geojson_query`. Simplifies view functions, improving code readability and maintainability.

Refactor map components and layer interactions.
Streamlined map components (Navigation, AttributeTable, MapElements) by improving tooltips, hover effects, and dynamic UI interactions. Introduced reusable logic for GeoJSON query handling, enhanced state management, and removed redundant code. These changes improve maintainability, usability, and overall performance.

MESSAGE.value:
Add initial GIS WebApp with frontend, backend, and map setup
Introduce a React-based frontend with Bootstrap integration, including components for WMS layer management, an interactive attribute table, and basemap handling. Backend setup includes a Django framework configured with basic files to support the application. A base template integrates OpenLayers for map visualization.

Add dynamic styling and labeling for vector layers
Introduced dynamic label placement and color customization for vector layers, leveraging `StyleHandler` and `LabelHandler`. Enhanced user interactivity by adding color pickers, label column selection, and refreshed layer rendering upon map events.

"Refactor map components and handlers for clarity and usability
Refactor code across Map, Navigation, and LayerHandler components to improve readability, maintainability, and functionality. Changes include indentation fixes, removal of redundant comments, and restructuring of state management for labels, styles, and attribute tables. Enhanced feature handling with label refreshing, editable layer names, and streamlined styling logic."

`Refactor map components and improve layer interactions`
Added Rename Layer functionality
Refactored multiple map components and handlers to enhance code readability and consistency. Improved the handling of layer properties, styling, labeling, and attribute table interaction. Added functionalities like editing layer names, dynamic label updates, and better color picker integration with UI optimizations.

Refactor GeoJSON query handling in views.
Extract redundant SQL query logic into a reusable utility function `execute_geojson_query`. Simplifies view functions, improving code readability and maintainability.

Refactor map components and layer interactions.
Streamlined map components (Navigation, AttributeTable, MapElements) by improving tooltips, hover effects, and dynamic UI interactions. Introduced reusable logic for GeoJSON query handling, enhanced state management, and removed redundant code. These changes improve maintainability, usability, and overall performance.
